entry.title: BIP 21 (modification BIP 20)]
entry.summary: In an email exchange on January 31, 2012, Wladimir posed a question to Pieter about whether "send to private address" should be included in a particular BIP (Bitcoin Improvement Proposal). Pieter clarified that the correct terminology should be "send of private key," and agreed that this issue should be addressed in a separate BIP.
